name: 樱花校园之恋模拟器
description:
Sakura School Love is a very interesting Japanese school love simulation game!
The game is built with 3D graphics, and you can enjoy the cherry blossom campus full of Japanese atmosphere! Talk about a young love on campus and relive the beautiful campus life!

1. Players are free to do what you like and enjoy the life of Japanese high school freely.

2. In a very free campus world, a brand new campus life story is about to unfold here.

3. In the game, you can take risks as you like. Enjoy the life of Japanese high school freely.

4. The player will act as the protagonist in the game, and you can also show yourself in the campus, which is very happy.

5. Created with 3D technology, returning to campus life, the gameplay is rich and exciting, and has a sense of substitution.

6. Open your brand new high school time, fresh and exquisite two-dimensional painting style, players can take risks on campus.

7. There is nothing to restrict you in the game, and the gameplay is very free, which attracts more students' attention.

8. You can even borrow various weapons, the scenes are very real, fighting alone and rampaging.
